comments.name: David看世界
comments.content: The US CPI data is quite interesting, core inflation hitting a four-year low. This might put some pressure on the Fed, but 'Fed Whisperer' still doesn't expect a cut this month, which makes sense given the geopolitical tensions like the Iran situation pushing oil prices up. Globally, it's a mix of tech innovation with Google breaking 4T and Apple choosing Gemini, alongside political drama between Trump and Powell. It's a complex landscape, a lot of dynamics to monitor, very different from what we typically observe in China's policy reactions.
